creator: carlos.palol@monkeyproject.net
text:
Using http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/lenya/trunk : 

1. ./build.sh
2. ./build.sh --noconfig module.test -Dmodule=org.apache.lenya.modules.migration
3. went to /default/authoring/
4. new odt, name, etc. Create

---

at <map:mount> -

creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
The ODT create screen now uses the standard create JX template.
Fixed in rev 442610.
